articles.description:
Meet Mikol: the Dare dev that doused himself in isopropyl alcohol and had fireworks shot at him. He instantly went up in flames and was rushed to hospital, where it became apparent he suffered third degree burns.

In this episode, Mikol reflects on the biggest night of his life, details his injuries, and the grueling recovery process he’s still in. Despite the traumatic incident, Mikol isn’t done with the project. Instead, he’s planning to build a decentralized app where community members can take on dares in exchange for DARE tokens.
articles.title: What's the Meta? Meet the Solana Dev Who Suffered Third Degree Burns to Pump a Token

articles.author: Damian Chmiel
articles.description:
Marathon  
Digital Holdings, Inc., the largest Bitcoin mining company by market  
capitalization, has been ordered to pay $138 million in damages following a  
unanimous jury verdict in a breach of contract lawsuit.
Marathon Digital Hit with  
$138 Million Verdict in Contract Breach Case
The  
verdict, issued in a federal court, concluded that Marathon had breached a  
non-disclosure, non-circumvention agreement with Michael Ho, the Chief Strategy  
Officer of Marathon's direct competitor, Hut 8.
According  
to court documents, Ho entered into an agreement with Marathon in 2020 to  
provide proprietary information regarding a large-scale energy supplier for the  
company's mining operations. The agreement stipulated that Marathon would not  
circumvent Ho by directly engaging with the supp…
articles.title: Largest Bitcoin Miner on Wall Street Ordered to Pay $138 Million

articles.author: Christian Encila
articles.description:
The developers of ApeCoin (APE) have grand plans to launch an authentic hotel in the bustling Thai capital of Bangkok. The hotel concept would provide a range of facilities meant to appeal to the general public as well as BAYC aficionados.
 
 
These comprise a swimming pool, a complimentary 50-night stay for coin holders, a separate ApeCoin bar, and sections of art exhibiting MBA-themed pieces. The hotel would also include conference rooms with themes from the Otherside, Apechain, and Mocaverse, therefore giving guests a really immersive experience.
 
 
Apecoin DAO wants to open an Ape themed hotel in downtown Bangkok https://t.co/2xzztb10WX
 
— Smol News (@NewsInSmol) July 21, 2024
 
Funding The Project
 
The ApeCoin DAO treasury will provide funding for this ambitious initiative; its bud…
articles.title: Bangkok Bound: ApeCoin DAO Eyes Ape-Themed Hotel In City Center

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: Telegram, the popular messaging app, has reached 950 million monthly active users worldwide, according to its founder Pavel Durov. The app has served as a platform for the popularization and growth of several cryptocurrency projects featuring tap-to-earn mechanics, such as Notcoin and the recently popular Hamster Kombat. Durov stated that the number of users has […]
articles.title: Telegram Reaches 950 Million Monthly Active Users

articles.author: Bradley Keoun
articles.description: The project, spun out of Polygon in 2023, has raised $75 million of funding and claims unique technologies as a provider of "data availability," or DA – the speciality of storing reams of transactional data produced by Ethereum layer-2 networks.
articles.title: Avail, Long-Awaited Blockchain Project for 'Data Availability,' Launches Main Network

articles.author: Bitcoin.com
articles.description: Kim Byoung-hwan, the nominee for head of South Korea’s top financial regulator, the Financial Services Commission (FSC), expressed caution about corporations holding bank accounts for cryptocurrency transactions. Speaking at a parliamentary session on Monday, Kim, a former vice finance minister, emphasized: “Taking into consideration the chaos we have experienced in the virtual asset market in […]
articles.title: South Korea’s FSC Nominee Says Past Crypto Chaos Calls for Strong Investor Protection

articles.author: Shaurya Malwa
articles.description: The defunct crypto exchange shuffled over $2.5 billion between wallets, some of which was sent to crypto exchange Bitstamp.
articles.title: Bitcoin Nears $66K as Mt. Gox Moves $130M to Bitstamp

articles.author: Jake Simmons
articles.description:
A new study conducted by the Nakamoto Institute has unveiled surprising insights into the demographics of Bitcoin ownership in the United States, challenging several popular assumptions about the typical cryptocurrency investor. The research, spearheaded by Troy Cross and Andrew Perkins, analyzed responses from a survey of 3,538 American adults, aiming to penetrate deeper into the socio-political and moral fabric underlying financial decisions related to BTC.
 
Who Is The Average US Bitcoin Owner?
 
“We wanted to understand who owns Bitcoin and who doesn’t, and why. That called for research. Not just surface-level demographics, but a deep look into the roots of our psycho-social identities,” Troy noted via X.
 
Contrary to the common stereotype that BTC enthusiasts predominantly align with…
articles.title: Who Holds Bitcoin? New Report Unmasks US Owners

articles.author: Amitoj Singh
articles.description: The primary demand from India's crypto industry was to reduce the controversial tax-deducted-at-source (TDS) policy on crypto transactions from 1% to 0.01%
articles.title: India Keeps Controversial Crypto Tax Rules Unchanged, Finance Minister's Budget Speech

articles.author: Rubmar Garcia
articles.description:
Over the weekend, English Football club Real Bedford FC (RBFC) announced it had bought $4.5 million in Bitcoin to add to its treasury. The move is part of the non-league club’s long-term strategy to get promoted to the Premier League. The club’s dream has previously been supported by Gemini founders Cameron and Tyler Winklevoss.
 
 
Real Bedford FC Adds 66 BTC To Its Treasury
 
On Sunday, Peter McCormack, host of the What Bitcoin Did podcast and Chairman of Real Bedford FC, announced that the English football club had acquired 66.9 Bitcoin (BTC). This purchase raised the club’s holdings to 82.7 BTC, worth around $5.37 million.
 
In the X post, McCormack detailed that the purchase was valued at $4,500,420.69, with an average price of $67,220 per Bitcoin. Additionally, he noted that the tota…
articles.title: English Football Club Buys $4.5 Million In Bitcoin For Premier League Promotion Strategy

articles.author: Omkar Godbole
articles.description: BTC failed to take out key price resistance despite huge inflows into BlackRock's IBIT.
articles.title: BlackRock's Spot Bitcoin ETF Draws $526M in Net Inflows

articles.author: Amitoj Singh
articles.description: "This transaction marks a final chapter in the wind-down and is the best possible outcome for customers of BlockFi," said Mohsin Y. Meghji, Plan Administrator of BlockFi Inc.
articles.title: BlockFi Administrator Submits Plan in Court to Make Customers Whole

articles.author: Sergio Goschenko
articles.description: Anatoly Aksakov, the Chairman of the Russian State Duma Committee on the Financial Market, has stated that ‘Hamster Kombat’, a popular tap-to-earn game, should be stopped in Russia. Aksakov emphasized that ‘Hamster Kombat’ manipulates the psyche of citizens, leading them to believe that they can become wealthy with minimal effort through playing this type of […]
articles.title: Leader of Russian State Duma’s Financial Market Committee Labels ‘Hamster Kombat’ a ‘Scam’ and Calls for Its Termination

articles.author: Omkar Godbole
articles.description: An address labeled "U.S. Government: Ryan Farace Seized Funds" moved BTC worth nearly $4 million to Coinbase 10 hours ago.
articles.title: U.S. Government Moves $4M Bitcoin to Coinbase, Arkham Data Show

articles.author: Arnab Shome
articles.description:
The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has provided final approval to spot Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs), which will follow the listing and trading of these instruments on three American exchanges on July 23.
SEC Approves Ether ETF
The final stamp on the S-1 registration forms of the spot Ethereum ETF issuers came two months after the regulator approved the listing of the crypto instruments on the Nasdaq, New York Stock Exchange, and Chicago Board Options Exchange.
The approved issuers of the spot Ether ETF include BlackRock, Fidelity, 21Shares, Bitwise, Franklin Templeton, VanEck, and Invesco Galaxy. Interestingly, all of them also offer spot Bitcoin ETFs, which the SEC greenlighted at the beginning of this year.
“Our clients are increasingly interested in gaining exposure t…
articles.title: Spot Ether ETFs to Start Trading Today amid SEC’s Final Approval

articles.author: Keshav Verma
articles.description:
Data shows that the crypto derivatives market has seen high long liquidations in the past day, as Bitcoin tumbled after its recovery of $68,000.
 
Bitcoin Has Been Going Through Some High Volatility Recently
 
The past couple of weeks have seen Bitcoin show some sharp action, with its price significantly recovering from its lows of around $54,000. The past day had seen the cryptocurrency advance further in this rally, with BTC breaking past $68,000.
 
 
Since this surge, though, the coin has seen a retrace, as it now trades around $66,800. The chart below shows what cryptocurrency’s recent performance has looked like.
 

 
 
Expectedly, the rest of the cryptocurrency sector has also shown some volatility following the lead of the number one Bitcoin. A consequence of this sharp price action…
articles.title: $110 Million Crypto Longs Erased As Bitcoin Retraces After Recovery Past $68,000

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: India supports the idea of an independent BRICS payments system but stresses the importance of a cautious and systematic approach. According to Ash Narain Roy, Director of India’s Institute of Social Sciences, thorough discussions among all parties are essential before making any decisions. He noted that many BRICS members share this cautious perspective. India Supports […]
articles.title: India Favors BRICS Payment System, Says Institute Director

articles.author: Ronaldo Marquez
articles.description:
On Monday, Hong Kong-based gaming software company Animoca Brands, The Open Network (TON) blockchain, Moca Network, and the MOCA Foundation announced a new partnership to catalyze the adoption of the Open Network ecosystem and establish its position for GameFi and Web3 gaming. 
 
MOCA And Toncoin Reserve
 
According to the announcement, as part of the partnership, The Open Network Foundation, Mocaverse, and the MOCA Foundation will work together to create a $20 million MOCA coin and Toncoin reserve, the native token of the Layer 1 (L1) blockchain. 
 
This reserve will incentivize developer and user adoption of the Open Network ecosystem through collaborations such as The Open League, hackathons, and accelerator programs to foster cross-functional development and increase activity within th…
articles.title: TON Blockchain And Animoca Brands Unveil $20M Initiative To Reach 1.6 Billion Users

articles.author: Kevin Helms
articles.description: Analysts have commented on the U.S. dollar trend following President Joe Biden’s decision not to seek re-election, noting a slight decline in the dollar against a basket of currencies. Bank of America’s head of global foreign exchange research mentioned: “There is a growing consensus that the dollar will be stronger if Trump wins due to […]
articles.title: Analysts Predict US Dollar Trends Amid Biden’s Withdrawal and Trump’s Lead

articles.author: Scott Matherson
articles.description:
With the Spot Ethereum ETFs expected to begin trading on Tuesday, July 23, expectations for the ETH price have shot up drastically. Numerous analysts and market experts have come forward to predict that it would be a great development for the ETH price, pushing it to new all-time highs. However, one analyst has warned investors to exercise caution during this time as the Spot Ethereum ETFs going live may not have the expected effect immediately.
 
Why The Spot Ethereum ETFs May Lead To A Decline
 
While the Spot Ethereum ETFs going live for trading have been well-received by the crypto community, crypto expert Benjamin Cohen has pointed out another alarming development that could send the ETH price crashing. This time, it is the ETH supply increasing rapidly.
 
 
In the X (formerly Twitter…
articles.title: ETH Price Could Crash Despite Spot Ethereum ETFs Euphoria, Analyst Explains Why

articles.author: Jamie Redman
articles.description: Spot ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) are set to debut on Tuesday, July 23, 2024, following approval from the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). Blackrock, the world’s largest asset manager, announced that its Ishares Ethereum Trust ETF (ETHA) will commence trading on Nasdaq on Tuesday, featuring a one-year fee waiver of 0.12% for the first […]
articles.title: Spot Ethereum ETFs Set to Launch: Blackrock Highlights Rising Demand for Digital Asset ETFs
